title: Traptrix Vesiculo

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-You may visit a player, giving them the blistered status.
-You may choose not to blister anybody this night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Blistered players will be roleblocked, and notified at the start of the following night that "An intense pain overwhelms you!"
-There vote will not count for majority that die, and they will be unable to take actions the following night.
-After one night of the inability to take actions, blistered players lose the blister status.
-Every player who visits you receives the blistered status.
-You may multitask, however you may not use a trap hole and any of your abilities in the same night.

desc:
Post 3037
*Hmmm? Is that a blister growing?*
